mapper.insert: insert into users(uid, upass, uname, school, phone, address1, address2, regdate) values(#{uid},#{upass},#{uname},"서울대", #{phone}, #{address1},#{address2}, now())
mapper.update: update users set upass=#{upass} where uid=#{uid}
mapper.select: select uid ,uname ,phone ,image ,address1 ,address2 ,date_format(regdate, "%Y.%m.%d.") as fmtdate ,date_format(fmtmodi, "%Y.%m.%d.") as fmtmodi from users where uid=#{uid}
